snippet: Wheels of sheep’s milk cheese are coated with herbs, including rosemary, lemon thyme, marjoram, elderberries and hop flowers, then aged.
abstract: Murray's Cheese is offering wheels of sheep’s milk cheese that are coated with herbs, including rosemary, lemon thyme, marjoram, elderberries and hop flowers, then aged.
lead_paragraph: Wheels of sheep’s milk cheese are coated with herbs, including rosemary, lemon thyme, marjoram, elderberries and hop flowers, then aged.
